column4: Hi, I am using an Audigy 2 sound card with what I believe is ALSA.  I had pulseaudio but heard that it was terrible so I removed it.  Now sometimes the music is fine, other times it is muffled, and sometimes it is reverberated.  9.04 Jaunty.
you removed it without trying it?
no wonder you might have problems... pulseaudio is a rather large component of audio in ubuntu
I had issues with games not working correctly with it, removing it fixed the games, but now for some reason my music has changed.
